site.keywords: developer, programmer, computer engineering, portfolio, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

cards.title: Education
cards.text: Computer Engineering student at UNOPAR - University of Northern Paraná. Constantly evolving in the technology area, always seeking new knowledge and challenges for professional growth.

cards.title: Passion for Technology
cards.text: Passionate about programming, technology and continuous learning. I believe that technology has the power to transform the world and I seek to contribute to this transformation through the development of innovative solutions.

cards.title: Jiu-jitsu & Discipline
cards.text: Jiu-jitsu practitioner, a sport that teaches me discipline, resilience and strategy - qualities that I apply directly to software development and solving complex problems.

objetivo.title: Professional Objective
objetivo.text: I am seeking a position in the IT area as a Developer or Database Analyst, where I can apply my knowledge in computer and network maintenance, while continuing to develop my skills in technical support, systems administration, software development and database management.

areas.title: Developer
areas.text: Interest in working on web applications and systems development, using modern technologies and following best programming practices.

areas.title: Database
areas.text: I wish to work with database modeling, administration and optimization, ensuring system integrity and performance.
